formElement.label: Configuration:
formElement.documentation: Configuration name from which the Admin URL and credentials will be read.

formElement.label: WLST Absolute Path:
formElement.documentation: Absolute path to WLST. i.e: '/path/to/wlst.cmd' or 'wlst.sh'.

formElement.label: Datasource Name:
formElement.documentation: The unique name that identifies this Datasource in the WebLogic domain to delete it.
